amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for all of the member-requested earmarks for military construction projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-195 to prohibit funding for all of the member-requested earmarks for military construction projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 62 - 358 (Roll no. 528).
